tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE email_engagement (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_email TEXT,
    recipient_email TEXT,
    engagement_time TIMESTAMP,
    engagement_type TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE email_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    send_date TIMESTAMP,
    open_status BOOLEAN,
    click_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  email_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  registration_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE email_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  email_id INT,
  sent_date TIMESTAMP,
  opened_date TIMESTAMP,
  clicked_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE email_engagement (
  engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  email_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  engagement_type VARCHAR(20),
  engagement_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (email_id) REFERENCES email_logs(email_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
)
CREATE TABLE users ( user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE emails ( email_id INT PRIMARY KEY, subject VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, body TEXT NOT NULL, sent_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, user_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id) );

CREATE TABLE opens ( open_id INT PRIMARY KEY, email_id INT NOT NULL, opened_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, user_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (email_id) REFERENCES emails(email_id), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id) );

CREATE TABLE clicks ( click_id INT PRIMARY KEY, email_id INT NOT NULL, clicked_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, user_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (email_id) REFERENCES emails(email_id), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id) );

CREATE TABLE EmailCampaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP,
    total_recipients INT
);

CREATE TABLE EmailEngagement (
    engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email_id INT,
    subscriber_id INT,
    engagement_type VARCHAR(50),
    engagement_date TIMESTAMP
);
